sentences.en: Adopt the imported brakes and motors of Italy, orientate exactly and maintain long life.
sentences.cn: 采用意大利进口刹车马达, 定位准、寿命长.

sentences.en: Anxiety comes from not being able to orientate yourself in your own existence.
sentences.cn: 不能适应生活便会产生焦虑。

sentences.en: How do we orientate the function of internal accounting control?
sentences.cn: 内部会计控制的功能如何定位?

sentences.en: It is extremely important to orientate the development of leading industry.
sentences.cn: 摘要主导产业发展的关键是定位要准确.

sentences.en: Prose translation from Chinese to English should orientate itself ultimately towards Sino - western Comparative Aesthetics.
sentences.cn: 摘要散文英译应以作为中西艺术哲学比较研究的中西比较美学为指归.

sentences.en: The explorer climbed a tree in order to orientate himself.
sentences.cn: 那位勘探者为了确定他所在的地点爬到了一颗树上.

sentences.en: The first days of school are meant to orientate freshmen to campus life.
sentences.cn: 开学头几天学校有意让新生熟悉一下学校生活.

sentences.en: The mountaineers found it difficult to orientate themselves in the fog.
sentences.cn: 登山的人在浓雾中难以确定自己的方位.

sentences.en: The reason for this was that he decided to orientate the map in the direction of the Pole Star since Polaris was the immovable guiding light in which the voyagers of that era placed their trust.
sentences.cn: 他之所以要这样做就是因为他决定以北极星的方向来确定地图的方位。 因为北极星是一盏不动的导航灯，那个时代的航海家们主要依靠北极星来导航。

sentences.en: To discover indistinguishable breast lesions and orientate them accurately for the operation.
sentences.cn: 目的:发现乳腺隐匿性疾病,为乳腺隐匿性病灶手术做准确定位.

sentences.en: Try to orientate your students towards the science subjects.
sentences.cn: 把学生的兴趣尽力引导到理科方面.
